text.div:
Patient Receiving ACE/ARB Therapy

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G8506 Patient receiving angiotensin converting enzyme (ace) inhibitor or angiotensin receptor blocker (arb) therapy
